name: SnowReportforMountPleasant
0:
”Alexa, open Mount Pleasant”
”Alexa, ask Mount Pleasant for the snow report”
”Alexa, ask Mount Pleasant for latest conditions”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mount pleasant
des: The Mount Pleasant Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions, base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
